name: Dark of Light - Turn-based RPG Game
name_original: Dark of Light - Turn-based RPG Game
description:
Being teleported into a dark place, you must set out on a trip to find your way out while seeking chances to strengthen yourself and get past any dangers on the way.

Get ready to immerse yourself into a mysterious fantasy setting filled with hidden lore and a fast-paced turn-based combat system!

The game is in early access with potential content updates to come.

CONTROLS:

  • PC:  ↑↓←→ to move, ENTER to interact.
  • Mobile: use the joystick to move, A to interact, B to back/menu.
